title: Iowa Gov. Terry Branstad's Winning Ways
teaser: The Republican governor is on track to become the longest serving governor in the history of the United States.
contentencoded:
The Republican governor of Iowa is on track to become the longest serving governor in the history of the United States. Terry Branstad was sworn into his sixth non-consecutive term last week.

Iowa Public Radioâ€™s Clay Masters reports on how Branstad keeps winning elections and why many of his governor friends will be making appearances with him this year in the state that kicks of presidential elections.

  • Read more on this story via Iowa Public Radio

Reporter

  • Clay Masters, host and reporter for Iowa Public Radio. He tweets @Clay_Masters.
